title: Ice Cream Is the Answer to Everything
detail_text: <:th_ch0209/>Fueeh~....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>Waah! Rina-chan, what happened!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>I was practicing for the live show wearing the Rina-chan’s board, but…. It’s so hot….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>I see, are you okay?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>I’m okay…. Maybe not so okay…. Fueeh~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>I only have a towel, but I’ll fan you for a bit. *flap flap*~.... How is it?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>It’s cool…. It feels good….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>When you’ve cooled down a little, should we go for some ice cream? You know, I have a coupon for a triple for the price of a double<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>I’ll go! A triple is a treat<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>Fufu, it’s hard to decide what flavors we should get, huh~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
